Method Detail

getMedicalTestArguments

@SystemAPI
public ArgumentList getMedicalTestArguments(java.lang.String medicalTest)
Gets the arguments to a type of MedicalTest

Parameters:
medicalTest - the type of MedicalTest
Returns:
an array of PubblicArguments which, when answered, can be used for the creation of a new MedicalTest of the given type
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
NotAFactoryException - the given type was invalid

makeMedicalTest

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String makeMedicalTest(java.lang.String medicalTest,
                                                  ArgumentList argv)
Creates a new medical test of the given type

Parameters:
medicalTest - the type of test to create
argv - the arguments to the creation of the new test
Returns:
the details of the newly created test
Throws:
NotAFactoryException - the given type of medical test was invalid
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
WrongArgumentListException - the given arguments did not match the medical test type
NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor has no patientfile opened for which to create this test
InvalidArgumentException - thrown if the list or one of the arguments is null, or if the answer does not satisfy the constraints.

getAvailableMedicalTests

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String[] getAvailableMedicalTests()
. Gets the available medical tests which can be created

Returns:
an array of strings containing the details of tests
